definition: to watch from a height or distance/to survey
to understand clearly/to be clear about/plain/clear
to watch from a height or distance/to keep a lookout
variant of 了如指掌[liao3 ru2 zhi3 zhang3]
see 了如指掌[liao3 ru2 zhi3 zhang3]
to go on sentry duty/to stand guard

sentences.english: Can you imagine how much smarter this is going to make you look?
sentences.chinese: 能想像這會讓你看上去比以前聰明瞭多少嗎？

sentences.english: We have also discussed how to develop the excellent situation.
sentences.chinese: 我們也討論瞭如何發展大好形勢。

sentences.english: The small demo program shows how to use the oscilloscope control.
sentences.chinese: 小演示程序演示瞭如何使用示波器的控制。

sentences.english: He looked very intelligent, I must say, when he said that.
sentences.chinese: 我必須得承認，他看起來太聰明瞭，當他說。

sentences.english: Gradually, the sky lit up, sea, and days have become clear when.
sentences.chinese: 漸漸地，天空亮了起來，海和天也變得分明瞭。

sentences.english: Finally, you learned how to interpret the results of a maximization problem.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我們學習瞭如何解釋最大化問題的結果。

sentences.english: By the first century BC the Chinese had developed the technology for deep drilling boreholes.
sentences.chinese: 公元前一世紀，中國人已經發明瞭深井鑽探技術。

sentences.english: Content distinguish Bumin, the strong overall sense, user-friendly experience.
sentences.chinese: 內容區分佈明瞭，整體感強烈，便於用戶體驗。

sentences.english: Moreover, the quick example only shows how to poll one time.
sentences.chinese: 此外，本文的示例僅展示瞭如何進行單次輪詢。

sentences.english: Does the supplier write its the precise address and fax number on the head of the letter ?
sentences.chinese: 供應商的信頭是否寫明瞭公司地址和傳真號碼？

sentences.english: This example program demonstrates how to use a dynamic recordset.
sentences.chinese: 這個程序演示瞭如何使用一個動態記錄集。

sentences.english: That's officially spelt out in the latest five-year plan.
sentences.chinese: 這在最新的五年計劃裏都正式闡明瞭。

sentences.english: Darvin had not seen Yao Ming up close for awhile.
sentences.chinese: 達爾文已經很久沒有這麼近距離的看見過姚明瞭。

sentences.english: But it is still unclear what information was actually peddled.
sentences.chinese: 但是到底兜售什麼信息纔算內幕交易還仍不明瞭。

sentences.english: By introducing a typical case this paper expounds the common reasons for disbanding a corporation compulsorily in judicial procedure.
sentences.chinese: 以典型案例作引子，闡明瞭公司司法解散的理由。

sentences.english: Prince Dastan I've seen it's power with my own eyes.
sentences.chinese: 達斯坦王子“我已經明瞭我所見識到的力量有多大。

definition: to gaze afar/to look into the distance
to bother/to press sb, usu. to do sth/it's a tough job/sorry to bother you (polite, used to thank sb for a favor)
the trip has not been made in vain/the trip has been well worthwhile/it's been a worthwhile trip
to stand for a long time/to wait/to look forward to/to accumulate
